name: AIL723 Graph Machine Learning
description: Introduction and Motivations for Machine Learning with Graphs, Graph and its Matrices, Graph Theory, Laplacian Matrix and Smoothness, Graph Learning from Data, Graph Embedding, Label Propagation, Manifold Regularization, semi-, un-, and supervised Learning with Graphs, Graph Data Mining, Deep Learning with Graphs.
pre: ELL780 / ELL409 / ELL784 / AIL701 / COL774/ COL341
